name: German Mulled Wine
description: This German mulled wine is the perfect Christmas drink! It's prepared from red wine that is heated and flavored with Christmas spices and oranges. It's ready in just 10 minutes!

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients in a saucepan and stir well.
recipeInstructions.name: Combine all ingredients in a saucepan and stir well.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat it up for a couple of minutes over very low heat. Make sure not boil the mulled wine because then the alcohol will evaporate and it won't taste right.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat it up for a couple of minutes over very low heat. Make sure not boil the mulled wine because then the alcohol will evaporate and it won't taste right.

recipeInstructions.text: Strain through a sieve and serve hot in heat-resistant glasses or mugs.
recipeInstructions.name: Strain through a sieve and serve hot in heat-resistant glasses or mugs.

keywords: how to make mulled wine, mulled wine, mulled wine recipe
